Text: I am guessing that this site has either acquired content from Little Mutt (who do a similar set of clips) or they have just copied the idea.  Either way, it is pretty boring seeing the same formula time after time.....  for me that is.
you should have included screens in the torrent itself

Better to have screens in the description, that way for us on slower connections we don't have to wait 40 mins for the pictures to be seeded to us when checking the linked pictures only takes a half second per picture.
